item.title: Need help with making safe zones
item.dc:creator: @delta delta
item.description:
@delta wrote:

search for public boolean nonWild() {

(if you cant find public boolean nonWild() { try public boolean safezone() { )

after a || in that code add this

(absX >= 1111  && absX <= 2222  && absY >= 3333 && absY <=4444 ) ||

stand in the southwest corner…
change the 1111 and 3333 to the southwest coords you want for your safezone…
now stand in the northeast corner…
change the 2222 and 4444 to the northeast coords you want for you safezone…

so if you want this box to be a safezone

stand in the southwest and get those coords, and stand in the northwest and get those coords

| Northeast |
| |
| |
[SouthWest_________]

Read full topic
item.source: Need help with making safe zones
